Room.Name: Caledonia Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Caledonia Road between the east village gate and Poor Alley.
Room.LongDescription: Ramshackle houses are packed closely together on both sides of the road, and people are hanging out windows, talking to each other. A small church is almost to the corner on the north side, but why is there an upside down cross outside, and why is the head of a horned billy goat proudly on display at the door?
